message: Hello Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your business. Before we proceed, I would like to propose an initial price of $15000 for the product. This reflects its high quality and value. Please let me know if this offer suits your budget, or if you have any counteroffer suggestions.

I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12000. I'm willing to make a serious offer at this price, and I believe it's a fair reflection of the product's value. Would you be willing to consider this price?
